Instance Method Details

# (Function) create(methods)

Create method

Parameters:

  • methods ( Object ) — new prototype methods for new class

Options Hash: (methods):

  • init ( Function ) — Function to initalise plugin
  • events ( Function ) — Function for UI event setup
  • action ( Function ) — Function for UI actions

Returns:

  • ( Function ) — initalise the plugin with the element
